cast.overview: When a massive, gilled monster emerges from the deep and tears through the city, the government scrambles to save its citizens.  A rag-tag team of volunteers cuts through a web of red tape to uncover the monster's weakness and its mysterious ties to a foreign superpower.  But time is not on their side - the greatest catastrophe to ever befall the world is about to evolve right before their very eyes.
cast.title: Shin Godzilla

details.biography: So Nozawa (野沢 聡, Nozawa Sō, born April 3, 1973) is a Japanese stage actor and voice actor from Tokyo who is affiliated with 81 Produce. He was formerly affiliated with Office PAC. He is the son of the late voice actor Nachi Nozawa (野沢 那智).
details.name: So Nozawa
